The word<S>1697</S> that Jeremiah<S>3414</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Baruch<S>1263</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Neriah<S>5374</S>, when he had written<S>3789</S> these words<S>1697</S> in a book<S>5612</S> at the mouth<S>6310</S> of Jeremiah<S>3414</S>, in the fourth<S>7243</S> year<S>8141</S> of Jehoiakim<S>3079</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Josiah<S>2977</S> king<S>4428</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, unto thee, O Baruch<S>1263</S>;
Thou didst say<S>559</S>, Woe<S>188</S> is me now! for the LORD<S>3068</S> hath added<S>3254</S> grief<S>3015</S> to my sorrow<S>4341</S>; I fainted<S>3021</S> in my sighing<S>585</S>, and I find<S>4672</S> no rest<S>4496</S>.
Thus shalt thou say<S>559</S> unto him, The LORD<S>3068</S> saith<S>559</S> thus; Behold, that which I have built<S>1129</S> will I break down<S>2040</S>, and that which I have planted<S>5193</S> I will pluck up<S>5428</S>, even this whole land<S>776</S>.
And seekest<S>1245</S> thou great things<S>1419</S> for thyself? seek<S>1245</S> them not: for, behold, I will bring<S>935</S> evil<S>7451</S> upon all flesh<S>1320</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: but thy life<S>5315</S> will I give<S>5414</S> unto thee for a prey<S>7998</S> in all places<S>4725</S> whither thou goest<S>3212</S>.
